name: Spinning and Aerial Kicks
description: Develop high-flying, spinning, and acrobatic kicks for advanced Taekwondo techniques.

cards.title: Tornado Kick
cards.description: A spinning kick that generates speed and power through rotation.
bulletpoints: Step forward and pivot for momentum
Use the rear leg to execute a full spin
Strike with the instep or shin for impact
cards.summaryText: Whip through the tornado kick with a driving step, full spin, and sharp instep impact.

cards.title: Jumping Back Kick
cards.description: A counterattack kick that delivers a powerful blow while retreating.
bulletpoints: Jump backward while rotating the hips
Kick straight back with a fully extended leg
cards.summaryText: Launch the jumping back kick by hopping back, firing the heel straight out, and sticking the landing.
